faqs.question: What should I do if my TrimUI Brick doesn’t come with a microSD card?
faqs.answer: If your TrimUI Brick doesn’t include a microSD card, you’ll need to get one (preferably 64GB or larger) and flash an operating system onto it. Recommended options: MinUI, Knulli, StockMix.

faqs.question: Best configuration for NDS (Nintendo DS)?
faqs.answer: For the best NDS performance, use DraStic as the emulator. Set frameskip to auto, enable threaded 3D rendering, and adjust the screen layout for your preferred experience.

faqs.question: How to install MinUI, Knulli, StockMix, CrossMix, or other custom firmware?
faqs.answer: Installing custom firmware requires flashing the new OS onto a microSD card. Check this step-by-step guide.
